banner.line1: There are 24 million people with physical disabilities in China, of which 4.6% are

goal.title: What we do？
goal.content: With economical and simple 3D printing mechanical prosthetics, and open-source dissemination of this technology, the Hands-On program hopes to help millions of young children with physical disabilities in China.

step1.title: Collect information (for those who need prosthesis)
step1.content: we will match prosthetic designers and volunteers for children with different physical disabilities

step2.title: Design customized prosthetics
step2.content: based on the data, we will design the appropriate model for every child

step3.title: Produced through our volunteer community network
step3.content: we create prosthetics for the needy through a network of volunteers across the country

step4.title: Track and improve prosthetic limbs
step4.content: we will conduct regular return visits to the recipients and provide assistance for the use of prostheses in daily life.

promise.title: We promise:
promise.content: All prosthetics will be donated free of charge to those in need
